TEXT.TITLE: LOWE'S <LOW> SALES UP SEVEN PCT
TEXT.BODY: Lowe's Cos Inc said sales for the four weeks ended March 27 were up seven pct to 183.9 mlnm dlrs from 171.1 mln dlrs a year earlier, with same-store sales up one pct to 172.5 mln dlrs from 170.4 mln dlrs. Reuter
